alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 8:23PM AKST until December 07 at 4:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow occurring. Additional snow accumulation of 4 to 6 inches expected for a total snow accumulation of 9 to 14 inches. * WHERE...Anchorage. * WHEN...Through 4 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall rates are expected Tuesday evening with snowfall rates becoming less overnight. Light snow will then linger through the afternoon Wednesday, especially near the mountains.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
